Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Remove items from the bathroom sink.', '2. Clean the bathroom sink surface and drain thoroughly
.']

behavior remove_from_sink(item:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(item)
        # Temporarily hold an item to remove it from the sink
        achieve not inside(item, sink)
        # Ensure the item is no longer inside the sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and is_bathroom(sink)
        # Identify the bathroom sink

        foreach item: item:
            if inside(item, sink):
                # Check for items inside the bathroom sink
                remove_from_sink(item, sink)
                # Remove the items from the sink

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Rinse the sink to remove any loose debris.', '2. Apply the appropriate cleaning product to the 
sink surfaces.', '3. Scrub the sink thoroughly with a brush or sponge.', '4. Rinse the sink clean an
d wipe dry with a towel.']

behavior rinse_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Ensure the sink is filled with water
        rinse(sink)
        # Rinse the sink to remove any loose debris

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and dirty(sink)
        # Select a dirty sink to clean
        rinse_sink(sink)
